original_title: As crianças sabem que tem algo acontecendo
overview: Children recreate their routines, within the current limitations, and organize new ways of playing in times of pandemic. And when this is all over, maybe those kids will have changed. Don't underestimate it, they know something is up. The film is a record, in collaboration with those responsible, of the routine of these 3 children: Lavinya from São Paulo, Karolayne from Recife, and Valeria de Medelín.
title: As crianças sabem que tem algo acontecendo
